channel.title: MASS CLICKIN plz help
channel.description: help me on my server ppl can just click really really fast and hit like 23, 29, 12 so on and call kill even me with a hp glitch in under 10secs plz help

item.title: MASS CLICKIN plz help
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

Go into ur Client.java

Search For The Object id u want to make non massing

search for it to it’s a case liek this…

case 2873: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You train Attack !"); actionTimer = 85; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[3]), 3); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Where it has actionTimer = 85;
u can change the “85” to any number i recommend 53 or higher, that stops them from massing on that object

Read full topic
